description:
Big changes are afoot in Edo in the wake of Shigeshige`s funeral and Nobunobu`s appointment as shogun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 1: Le jour où le démon se lamente
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part One: The Day the Demon Cried
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Ichi: Oni ga Naita Hi
さらば真選組篇一 鬼が哭いた日
